Package ctu.nengoros.comm.nodeFactory

Builds containers for ROS nodes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ExternalNodeContainer
    This is container for all nodes that can be ran externally and need to be handled by namespaceSupervisor and NodeFactory.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    NameProvider
    This enables to Nengoros to automatically push groups of ROS nodes (launched nodes and group modem) into own namespaces.
    NodeFactory
    Give me name and namespace, I will create your node and prepare it for launching.
    NodeGroup
    Group of nodes typically corresponds to one smart neuron.

Package ctu.nengoros.comm.nodeFactory Description

Builds containers for ROS nodes. ROS node can be onw of the following: Java thread which supports ROSjava and therefore implements org.ros.node.NodeMain. Installed ROS node which can be launched by command "rosrun [nodepackage.nodename]" Or any arbitrary native process. TODO: Only the Unix processes are supported so far. Tested on Ubuntu 12 and OS X 10.6, OS X 10.8.
